name: Lost In Town
description:
Welcome!

This is a really simple Number Wizard game.

Is the first game I have created, I made it specifically for my TECH190 & CMSC140 class. 

(Created entirely by me, including the background images that were made in Photoshop)

Feel free to rate it or leave comments. :)
